name: Super Oscar Premium
description:
Super Oscar is finally back and he isn't alone!
He has brought 3 new friends to complete all amazing worlds.


Super Oscar is the greatest platform adventure for your iOS devices! Everything has been carefully designed for you to have a lot of fun! We warn you, it´s not an easy game so good luck!

The game includes:
- 6 beautiful worlds(more coming soon)
- 35 awesome levels(more coming soon)
- 50+ different enemies
- 4 different characters
- 6 different costumes
- 8 different bullets
- Upgradable characters
- Achievements
- Leaderboards
- And a lot more features!


We hope all our players have a great time playing it, please rate and thanks a lot for playing!
